dialog_lines.line: Wow, so brave! Splish Splashisson is a blueberry pie thief... uh, I mean capable captain.
Awkwaaard. I guess there is still some work to be done to restore your reputation.
The least I can do is offer you another job to help in that restoration.
Seahorsevilla, the next port over, ordered a shipment of livestock.
This should be a simple delivery, just make sure they don't go hungry.
